decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun within 3 months and completed within 6 months from the date of this permission, otherwise this permission will lapse.	 | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title(s):
Block and Location Plan, Drawing No. A00, dated July 2024
Pre-Existing Ground Floor Plan, Drawing No. A01, dated May 2024
Pre-Existing Roof Plan, Drawing No. A02, dated May 2024
Pre-Existing Elevations, Drawing No. A03, dated May 2024
Pre-Existing Block Plan, Drawing No. A07, dated May 2024
Proposed Ground Floor Plan, Drawing No. A07, dated May 2024
Existing and Proposed Elevations, Drawing No. A09, dated July 2024
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings listed under condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
description: Construction of a boundary wall to the front of the property. (Part Retrospective/part modified)
